      • getChannelState

        public static Channel.ChannelState getChannelState(Channel channel)
        Gets the preferred Channel.ChannelState for the given Channel.
        Parameters:
        channel - The Channel to get the state for.
        Returns:
        The preferred Channel.ChannelState of the given Channel, or the default state for the given channel if there is no preference.

      • setChannelState

        public static void setChannelState(Channel channel,
                   Channel.ChannelState state)
        Sets the Channel.ChannelState for the given Channel. Only the non-hidden channels can be changed.
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel to set the state for.
        state - The desired state of the channel.
